description: Man Utd: Welcome to Q&A with Simon Stone
title: Man Utd: Welcome to Q&A with Simon Stone
title_page: Man Utd: Welcome to Q&A with Simon Stone - BBC Sport
maintext:
We asked for your questions to put to our football reporter Simon Stone, who has been following Manchester United on their pre-season trip to the United States.
Over the course of Wednesday, we will be sharing his answers.
